ValidationRule.description: If an error type is selected and the "Personal Banker/CSR Name" field is blank, user is prompted to populate a user in the "Personal Banker/CSR Name" field before saving the record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Flow_Validation_Rule_Bypass_Check__c = FALSE && AND( ISBLANK( Personal_Banker_CSR_Name__c) , NOT ( ISBLANK( Error_Type__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have selected an Error Type. Please also select a Personal Banker/CSR Name.
